key.name: use-default-font
key.description: Whether to use the system's default fixed width font for editing text instead of a font specific to pluma. If this option is turned off, then the font named in the "Editor Font" option will be used instead of the system font.

key.name: editor-font
key.description: A custom font that will be used for the editing area. This will only take effect if the "Use Default Font" option is turned off.

key.name: color-scheme
key.description: The ID of a GtkSourceView Style Scheme used to color the text.

key.name: create-backup-copy
key.description: Whether pluma should create backup copies for the files it saves. You can set the backup file extension with the "Backup Copy Extension" option.

key.name: auto-save
key.description: Whether pluma should automatically save modified files after a time interval. You can set the time interval with the "Autosave Interval" option.

key.name: auto-save-interval
key.description: Number of minutes after which pluma will automatically save modified files. This will only take effect if the "Autosave" option is turned on.

key.name: writable-vfs-schemes
key.description: List of VFS schemes pluma supports in write mode. The 'file' scheme is writable by default.

key.name: max-undo-actions
key.description: Maximum number of actions that pluma will be able to undo or redo. Use "-1" for unlimited number of actions.

key.name: wrap-mode
key.description: Specifies how to wrap long lines in the editing area. Use "GTK_WRAP_NONE" for no wrapping, "GTK_WRAP_WORD" for wrapping at word boundaries, and "GTK_WRAP_CHAR" for wrapping at individual character boundaries. Note that the values are case-sensitive, so make sure they appear exactly as mentioned here.

key.name: tabs-size
key.description: Specifies the number of spaces that should be displayed instead of Tab characters.

key.name: insert-spaces
key.description: Whether pluma should insert spaces instead of tabs.

key.name: auto-indent
key.description: Whether pluma should enable automatic indentation.

key.name: display-line-numbers
key.description: Whether pluma should display line numbers in the editing area.

key.name: highlight-current-line
key.description: Whether pluma should highlight the current line.

key.name: bracket-matching
key.description: Whether pluma should highlight the bracket matching the selected one.

key.name: display-right-margin
key.description: Whether pluma should display the right margin in the editing area.

key.name: right-margin-position
key.description: Specifies the position of the right margin.

key.name: smart-home-end
key.description: Specifies how the cursor moves when the HOME and END keys are pressed. Use "DISABLED" to always move at the start/end of the line, "AFTER" to move to the start/end of the line the first time the keys are pressed and to the start/end of the text ignoring whitespaces the second time the keys are pressed, "BEFORE" to move to the start/end of the text before moving to the start/end of the line and "ALWAYS" to always move to the start/end of the text instead of the start/end of the line.

key.name: restore-cursor-position
key.description: Whether pluma should restore the previous cursor position when a file is loaded.

key.name: enable-search-highlighting
key.description: Whether pluma should highlight all the occurrences of the searched text.

key.name: enable-syntax-highlighting
key.description: Whether pluma should enable syntax highlighting.

key.name: toolbar-visible
key.description: Whether the toolbar should be visible in editing windows.

key.name: toolbar-buttons-style
key.description: Style for the toolbar buttons. Possible values are "PLUMA_TOOLBAR_SYSTEM" to use the system's default style, "PLUMA_TOOLBAR_ICONS" to display icons only, "PLUMA_TOOLBAR_ICONS_AND_TEXT" to display both icons and text, and "PLUMA_TOOLBAR_ICONS_BOTH_HORIZ" to display prioritized text beside icons. Note that the values are case-sensitive, so make sure they appear exactly as mentioned here.

key.name: statusbar-visible
key.description: Whether the status bar at the bottom of editing windows should be visible.

key.name: side-pane-visible
key.description: Whether the side pane at the left of editing windows should be visible.

key.name: bottom-panel-visible
key.description: Whether the bottom panel at the bottom of editing windows should be visible.

key.name: max-recents
key.description: Specifies the maximum number of recently opened files that will be displayed in the "Recent Files" submenu.

key.name: print-syntax-highlighting
key.description: Whether pluma should print syntax highlighting when printing documents.

key.name: print-header
key.description: Whether pluma should include a document header when printing documents.

key.name: print-wrap-mode
key.description: Specifies how to wrap long lines for printing. Use "GTK_WRAP_NONE" for no wrapping, "GTK_WRAP_WORD" for wrapping at word boundaries, and "GTK_WRAP_CHAR" for wrapping at individual character boundaries. Note that the values are case-sensitive, so make sure they appear exactly as mentioned here.

key.name: print-line-numbers
key.description: If this value is 0, then no line numbers will be inserted when printing a document. Otherwise, pluma will print line numbers every such number of lines.

key.name: print-font-body-pango
key.description: Specifies the font to use for a document's body when printing documents.

key.name: print-font-header-pango
key.description: Specifies the font to use for page headers when printing a document. This will only take effect if the "Print Header" option is turned on.

key.name: print-font-numbers-pango
key.description: Specifies the font to use for line numbers when printing. This will only take effect if the "Print Line Numbers" option is non-zero.

key.name: auto-detected-encodings
key.description: Sorted list of encodings used by pluma for automatically detecting the encoding of a file. "CURRENT" represents the current locale encoding. Only recognized encodings are used.

key.name: shown-in-menu-encodings
key.description: List of encodings shown in the Character Encoding menu in open/save file selector. Only recognized encodings are used.

key.name: history-search-for
key.description: List of entries in "search for" textbox.

key.name: history-replace-with
key.description: List of entries in "replace with" textbox.

key.name: active-plugins
key.description: List of active plugins. It contains the "Location" of the active plugins. See the .pluma-plugin file for obtaining the "Location" of a given plugin.
